QuestData.Title: Striking the Rain
QuestData.Description: Now as for that "striking the rain" part... well, sometimes you have to.$B$B"Hope is the sun behind a stormy sky - ever in the heart, but veiled to the eye."$B$BThere seems to be no end to the sha pouring out of the temple. But in order to see beyond the veil of despair, you must carve through it.$B$BWith any luck, you'll find a sun behind the clouds...
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 18 Haunts of Despair at the Temple of the Red Crane.
QuestData.CompletionText: We shouldn't press further into the temple before clearing out some of the sha presence outside.
QuestData.RewardText: You know something, $p? We make a pretty good team!
